China: The Song general Wen Tianxiang was captured by Yuan forces.
Duanzong's younger brother Emperor Bing of Song became emperor of the Song dynasty.
Spain: Siege of Algeciras (1278–79): Castile laid siege to the Marinid port city of Algeciras.
Battle of Algeciras (1278): A combined Marinid-Granadan fleet destroyed the Castilian navy in the Strait of Gibraltar.
Vietnam: Trần Thánh Tông ceded the throne to his son Trần Nhân Tông.
